Message:
and he made a big stage
so everyone could watch her.

And guess what?
Mimi gets to dance, too!

Mimi’s so excited
to dance with her!

She actually said Mimi isn’t
ready for an audience yet...

that’s why she was
really strict in rehearsal.

But, I think that really
helped me improve!

You’ll be head over
paws with our dancing,
so I hope you enjoy it!
